findings.title: Unrestricted minting
findings.description: The contract deployer has unrestricted access to mint any amount of tokens at any time which is not described in the provided documentation.

findings.title: Too many digits
findings.description: Literals with many digits are difficult to read and review.
findings.location: BetuToken.sol contract, uint256 public initialSupply variable declaration

findings.title: Maximum line length
findings.description: Solidity declares maximum line length that should be followed.

findings.title: Incorrect versions of Solidity
findings.description: The solidity version used for VestingVault is too old (^0.4.24) and it doesnâ€™t correlate with the one used for the BetuToken (^0.6.2).

findings.title: Public function that could be declared external
findings.description: public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.
